title: Photo Location
description:
You extract EXIF data from a suspect's photo using exiftool and find:

GPS Latitude: 33 deg 44' 24.12" N
GPS Longitude: 116 deg 21' 21.60" W
Camera Make: Apple
Camera Model: iPhone 14 Pro
Date/Time: 2026:01:15 14:32:00

These coordinates point to a city in the Coachella Valley, California. What city is this?

Submit as: flag{city_name} (lowercase)
hints: Search these coordinates on Google Maps
This city is home to College of the Desert
